website_summaries.verdict: An affordable set of flavored balsamic vinegars. Makes a great gift.
pros: Includes 4 bottles (pear, raspberry, fig, and pomegranate) of great-tasting balsamic
Vinegar is sourced from Italy and is organically produced
Great for marinades, salad dressings, and sauces
cons: Some reviewers note the consistency is a bit thin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste like balsamic vinegar.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a flavored balsamic vinegar, like you find in the speciality stores, this is NOT it. This is more like thin vinegar with a little bit of flavoring. I would not serve this to a guest and claim it to be Balsamic vinegar. Perhaps that is why it is labeled "Balsamic Condiments". I was very disappointed with this product and will not buy it again. Going down the sink. I gave it 2 stars since they got the "vinegar" part right.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Watery, weak - NOT balsamic
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this purchase. True balsamic vinegar is thick and dark, and often a bit sweet. These are all watery and have hardly any flavor. Cannot discern one over the other. They are just regular vinegar, and not a very good one at that. I do not recommend these, and would never buy again. Would get a refund if it were possible. Waste of money if you are looking for balsamic vinegar, or even flavored vinegar.
customer_reviews.author: RL in MA

customer_reviews.title: Lightly flavored watery vinegar
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, this is very watery and not very flavorful. The description says "The grape must is boiled in traditional open vats over fire until it reduces and thickens, concentrating the flavors." I think they forgot to read their own description. I will dump it down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like balsamic vinegar and this brand is so full of flavor. My favorite is the Pear followed by the pomegranate. The price for the set is fantastic and they are all organic. I use it for so many things like marinates, and salad dressings. I even used it in my home made mayo you really can not go wrong with this product. In fact this is my second purchase and as soon as I use them up I plan to buy it again. Only thing I wish is that they had another set in different flavors. If you like sweet fruity taste you will love these balsamic vinegars.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Total Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the overall rating for this vinegar. I have had other balsamic vinegar including fig. This product was nothing like I expected given my prior experience and especially given the description provided. I do not believe this vinegar was 'barrel aged' as stated. It was as thin as water. I was looking forward to the 'tart, fruity and sweet' taste. It was simply sour. In my opinion the product is totally misrepresented. I consider it to be a complete rip-off. Basically it is an inferior balsamic vinegar with added flavor which isn't enough to mask its poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Taste is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love balsamic vinegars but they can sometimes be a little too acidic tasting, the added natural flavor in these vinegars cuts the kind of abrupt acidic taste enough so that I can use it directly on my salads and other foods without any oils, my favorite is the pear.
customer_reviews.author: JeanieLe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful flavors.
customer_reviews.text: These are so very tasty, and work well on my Whole 30 plan, because there is no sugar added! I make salad dressing with olive oil, and drizzle on chicken or fish before baking. I used the Fig on some roasted veggies!
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is terrible!!! All the flavors were so bad and overly acidic, i just threw them out.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to describe it properly. the taste was such that you could tell you'd have heartburn after swallowing it. i guess the best word to describe it was possibly being acidic. but the flavors tasted lousy too. I had bought a similar product in cape cod Mass when visiting relatives there and the brand i bought that was made in that area was really good. liked that one a lot. it was more costly. but it was better. but this one here is terrible
customer_reviews.author: RobH

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of cooking and was really looking forward to using these four balsamic's. They arrived on time and the bottles were unbroken. I tried the fig first. Fig balsamic is one of my favorites. It was thin, not thick like I was expecting. It would be good for salads and other dishes they need a light seasoning. The balsamic that I was looking for is thick, almost sludgy. One drop in a pan of four chicken thighs was enough to flavor all of them. I'm still looking for it. The last one that I bought was in the Pacific NW for $19 per bottle. If anyone knows what this is, please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Geer

customer_reviews.title: It is made with Wine vinegar and a very small amount of Balsamic Vinegar
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the raspberry I got a whiff of WINE Vinegar....I read the label and it is wine vinegar with a minute amount of balsamic vinegar! This product is totally misleading since you cannot see it clearly on the label that is in the description! False advertisement at it's best! Do not buy this if you are used to the taste of balsamic or flavored balsamic...this burn my chest! Tsk Tsk what a rip off!
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Nice For A Change In Flavor In Vinaigrettes, Recipes, Etc.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for Raspberry and found this set instead, so I ordered it. We like all the flavors and have used them in various recipes to replace regular Balsamic Vinegar and add a little fruit flavor. I think they would also make a nice gift. They come VERY well packed, so they can be mailed as a gift right from Amazon. Or, would make a wonderful addition to gift baskets, stockings, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great on greens
customer_reviews.text: My heart doctor says “NO OIL!!!!!” I am using these flavored vinegars to enhance salads in place of traditional dressings. I also have several small portions of cooked greens throughout the day. A small amount of one of these balsamics takes the bitter edge off the kale, collards, beet greens, etc. while adding that bit of acid to make them even more nutritious. A real winner for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: MAGEE

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and well priced!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Are these balsamic vinegars delicious! I eat salad every day. And this product really gives the salad some much needed character. I love all the flavors: raspberry, fig, pear and pomegranate. Absolutely will reorder again and again. Great value for the size of the bottles. They were delivered quickly and well protected. Can’t recommend highMy enough! You will not regret your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tonic

customer_reviews.title: So yummy, packed wonderfully, Gift it!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought just the fig flavor and loved it so much I searched for it here. I ordered two of these sets one as a gift. I used the fig as a salad dressing just by itself it was so good. I have pear open now and wonderful too. I think it would be wonderful on fish or cooked vegetables too as suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Books,Books,Books

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality balsamic so sharp that the flavors are obliterated
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered pear and fig flavored balsamic from a well-known kitchen retailer for many years. They run about $20 per bottle, this cheap stuff is nothing like it and I should have known better. I donated the unopened ones. Maybe someone will be able to use them. The rest, in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: MoneyPenny

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!!  They do not aggravate my GERD (Gastro Reflux):
customer_reviews.text: BEST for anyone who finds Balsamic too harsh. Although they contain balsamic, they are MILD. They give the salad a bit of a sweet taste, depending on the flavor. My favorite is Fig! For a perfect individual salad: 1 Tbsp. Extra Virgin Olive Oil, then toss salad until every leaf glistens. THEN spray the condiment of your choice. I add a bit of sea salt.
customer_reviews.author: dolores627

customer_reviews.title: worst balsamic ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love balsamic vinegars, all the fruity flavors they come in, but I have to say by far this is one of the worst ones I've ever had, all 4 flavors were terrible. Too bad it can't be returned. It was so awful tasting I couldn't even eat the salad. It tastes more like a chemical than a dressing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set of flavor choices.
customer_reviews.text: I had to taste all 4 of these as soon as they came. YUM!! I will be able to use them alone, on my salads, as a little drizzle on my roasted chicken or veggies and will make a fantastic marinade for pork and chicken. I love these, but really wish they had white balsamic choices also. I bought these because my absolute FAVORITE raspberry white balsamic is no longer available anywhere. I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Terri R. Schroder

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dr Gundry’s Pelligrino & Balsamic
customer_reviews.text: We are following Dr Gundry’s plant Paradox diet & have switched from diet soda to San Pelligrino with a splash of balsamic. We actually prefer it now and this 4 pack lets us vary the flavor of our water. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: DeborahDarlingTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for me to take each morning to control my GERDS. I was taking Braggs Apple Cider Vinagar but it is very strong and sour. Someone advised that any Balsamic vinegar would work so I got these flavored ones. I put it in my water and sip it all day while working. Just a teaspoon does it. Tastes fine. Much better than Braggs.
customer_reviews.author: K. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as balsamic vinegar but it clearly says on the bottles Balsamic Vinegar Condiment. I read the description which didn't mention that fact and only noticed when I opened the package. I was surprised but decided to give it a try anyway. It is watery thin and the flavor has a distinct fakeness to it. I will probably have to toss this down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen D. Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Nice combination of flavors and great quality
customer_reviews.text: These balsamic vinegars are awesome. Quite strong so go easy. I typically purchase these at local specialty shops which, unfortunately, have been going out of business in my area. These are a great replacement and are similar in price. These particular bottles are very nicely packaged and would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M

customer_reviews.title: Package was not marked "Fragile " and a bottle was broken
customer_reviews.text: While I am sure the vinegars are delicious, the packaging was not marked for glass and it was left in a precarious spot on my front porch (a bicycle seat). When it fell, and I got to it, there was vinegar pouring out. Fortunately, it was only one bottle, but that is one less bottle than what I paid for .
customer_reviews.author: Ann Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting organic vinegar assortment
customer_reviews.text: Each vinegar tastes really good. I bought the assortment especially for the pear vinegar to make a pear and walnut green salad, and it is delicious. So is the raspberry which I pair with raspberries and whatever nut I have on hand in a salad, and the other 2 are good as well. Of course, organic is always so much the better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous-not flavored at all. A lot of vinegar though!
customer_reviews.text: Had a professional chef over and we served these in several different salads. What a joke. No flavor at all. This seller clearly has a thing going since one cannot return these on Amazon. Good for the seller but bad for the rest of us!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson_rp565

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this set to several people for Christmas gifts. They were impressed! I continue to get feedback on the great flavors and all the ways they used them.
customer_reviews.author: Eye Care

customer_reviews.title: No viscosity, but all is not lost!
customer_reviews.text: Cute assortment; however, before I gift any I wanted to try one. I tried the pomegranate. Very much a liquid (watery) balsamic with a vinegar overtone. I put the contents of the bottle in a double boiler on low and added a teaspoon of sugar and boiled it down. Wonderful flavor, thick, and excellent for salads (now).
customer_reviews.author: Jodi JC Syverson

customer_reviews.title: Giftable
customer_reviews.text: The glass vinegar bottles were packaged well to avoid breaking/spilling. I like the variety of unique flavors. They are good to try in many recipes. I think this set would make a great gift for any cook you know.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: No RETURNS.  BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE. YOU CANNOT RETURN THIS ITEM! I decided after receiving this that I was going to do a different kind of gift basket so I wanted to return these and a set of oils I received. They do not accept returns!! I gave 2 star because it’s crap cs. I have no idea how it tastes
customer_reviews.author: Dina Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing vender customer service/product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: FABULOUS CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! It’s always important to package glass bottles properly and this vender did a fantastic job!!! My bottles arrived in a wrapping & in individual tightly fitted sponge slots inside the shipping box. The TLC assures me that the product is of the best quality & I’m looking forward to using them at my upcoming family dinner event. I will order with confidence any other selections this vender may have in inventory. Certainly & absolutely recommend to everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sigrid Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Thin Vinegar like
customer_reviews.text: these were not balsamic in nature. Balsamic vinegar are thick and brown. These were watery like vinegar that had fruit flavors tossed in
customer_reviews.author: Pat Savu

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW! Seriously...sooooooo delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hemmed and hawed over if I wanted to spend this much on 4 (four!) bottles of a product I've never tried...but I liked the idea of all the flavors. Wow!! They are SO tasty!!! You really don't need much! They are a little thinner than the flavored balsamics you buy at farmers markets and premium shee shee markets...but don't be dissuaded by that at all. You don't need all that sugary syrup sticky-ness to get the same amount of flavor these balsamics provide. I am a huge fan and would ABSOLUTELY buy again! It's fun to go in the cabinet and choose from the variety too. The packaging is sturdy, safe, and very professional looking. HIGH QUALITY!!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: was very excited to try right away. good flavored balsamic can be so good that sipping on a shot would not be strange. unfortunately this brand is not one of them. i will be making these into dressings.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The set is a nice set of balsamic vinegar flavors for the price. Compare the cost of individual bottles. I am enchanted with the pomegranate. It has replaced Alessi fig balsamic vinegar as my fave.
customer_reviews.author: Just An Ordinary Gal

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered on time. I love the flavors. Not as sweet or thick as some of the trendy stores. I use as salad dressing...ad a health alternative to creamy dressings. I would recommend this for the flavor, variety and amount in each bottle. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is ok, but honestly they’re just sitting on my shelf. They are sooo thin. Maybe as a marinade they might be ok. If you have a few years to let them sit on a shelf and age...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not much flavor
customer_reviews.text: These are mostly just plain vinegar. Not very balsamic, not very flavored, and very thin. Good balsamic is thick and rich. These seem like white vinegar with some dye and a hint of flavoring. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great way to experiment with different flavors. All four taste very fresh. No artificial taste like prepared store-bought dressings.
customer_reviews.author: Janetcatlady

customer_reviews.title: So happy that I found these!
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious and low in sugar, taste wonderful! I will be ordering these again, for myself and as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: NFulton

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best flavored vinegars I've tried. The fig is my favorite, could eat it every day and it makes greens taste like a dessert. The pear is really good too, and I was surprised to find that I liked the pomegranate. Will definitely order those three again!
customer_reviews.author: Seabrook Dreamin'

customer_reviews.title: Balsamic Lovers Must Try
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous presentation upon opening the 📦!!!! Flavors are smooth, fruity and work wonderful with red roasted peppers 🌶!! Highly recommend for gifting and as a special treat for the balsamic lover. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: John mack

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed, they all taste like plain vinegar and all taste the same. Definitely not worth the money. I would never buy them again. The reason I gave it one star was because I had to rate it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Petrucci

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Balsamic Vinegars❣️ Don’t hesitate to purchase 👍 Super fast shipping! I’ll be back for more👌 Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Mark nordland

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Flavors good but I had to reduce them to use the way I wanted as a salad dressing
customer_reviews.author: Anne Krisp

customer_reviews.title: Runny, not thick balsamic
customer_reviews.text: Flavors are good but this is funny balsamic vinegar. I prefer thicker balsamics.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: One of the bottles had sticky stuff all over it.
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged nicely. One of the bottles had a sticky substance on the cap and on the bottle itself.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste and Great for Gifts
customer_reviews.text: My family is in love with balsamic vinegar. They were looking for something unique for gifts and tried this set out. Very good taste, good variety and they love them. Definitely will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Kug

customer_reviews.title: good flavor, texture is not great
customer_reviews.text: While the flavor of these vinegars is very good, the texture is very watery. If you are expecting the thickness of a flavored balsamic like those purchased from a vinegar and oil shop you will be disappointed. I had to add honey to my salad dressing to get the texture right.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Mighty Watery and NOT vinegar
customer_reviews.text: A closer look at the bottle says it is a "condiment", but never calls itself vinegar. Poured out WAY FASTER than I expected. Taste is OK~~.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Vee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister for Christmas and she was thrilled! She loves balsamic vinegar and the flavors really appealed to her.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. Comes boxed securely and nicely. Flavors are pretty good and is alot of product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D, Sanatoga, PA

customer_reviews.title: balsamic vinegar
customer_reviews.text: it's a pretty watery product but all in all it has a good taste so little strong
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: All you taste is vinegar no fruit
customer_reviews.text: These all taste exactly the same. Super strong vinegar flavor and you cannot taste the fruit. Disappointed for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bagley

customer_reviews.title: These are delicious, but there is a problem with ...
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious, but there is a problem with the lids stripping, they don't fit well. I would have given 5 stars if not for the lid issue. I'm afraid if they tip over the vinegar will go all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE balsamic vinegar and have recently also fallen in love with flavored balsamic. This was a disappointment. Even reduced it tasted very little like balsamic, only slightly even of vinegar, and no raspberry flavor at all. I'm pretty bummed.
customer_reviews.author: alr

customer_reviews.title: No Pear
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor when you buy this for pack. When it arrives, pick up the bottle of pear balsamic and pour it down the drain. That flavor has ruined two of our dinners All the other flavors are fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: These are great for salad dressing and no salt!!
customer_reviews.text: These were so beautifully packaged I didn't want to take them out of the box. Great company!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C. Hardeman

customer_reviews.title: Delish!
customer_reviews.text: I make dressing with these and flavored olive oil. So much better than store bought, healthier and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie J

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: When I use these in on my salads, there is no need for any oil. I’m sure these can be used drizzled over vanilla ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: I'd like more bite to it, but a very good product just the same.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice package. I took off one star because I like a bit more bite in my Balsamic vinegar, but that is a personal taste thing. Overall I am very happy with the package. It would actually make a cute small gift to bring to someone's house when you go there for dinner.
customer_reviews.author: TCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and unusual flavors great for cooking or just dipping bread :)
customer_reviews.text: These are SOOOO good! I think the raspberry is amazing, but I love the kick of the pomegranate. The pear is a very pleasant flavor. Only the fig was a little disappointing, but only because the others raised my expectations so high. If you've never tried a flavored balsamic, this collection is a wonderful way to start.
customer_reviews.author: T.K. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Not Balsamic - but a good balsamic vinegar
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of thinking this was going to be a variety of lovely thick flavored balsamics. I should have looked closer at the info before I purchased it. These flavored vinegars are quite tasty but if you are looking for the rich balsamic this is not it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift option.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my mother-in-law for Christmas and she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: EluneG

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting vinegars
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how bold and smooth the flavors are in the vinegars. Definitely helps with mixing up the flavors for salads and other foods.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: thin & low on flavor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this instead of previous purchase (baja precious) because it was organic. But it was so watery and devoid of taste I threw it out. Ruined a good salad.
customer_reviews.author: berglar

customer_reviews.title: Love these balsamic vinegars.  Good price.
customer_reviews.text: I wish they offered other flavor packs... I would buy them too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Organic flavored balsamics
customer_reviews.text: These balsamic vinegars had a variety of interesting flavors. Gave them as a gift along with a set of flavored olive oils. Great for salads, cooking and provides the opportunity to really be creative. Good value as well!
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Packer

customer_reviews.title: Very well received.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this set of balsamic vinegars as a gift. The recipient tells me it's really great.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for glazes
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor even when reduced to glaze. Makes veggies pop!!
customer_reviews.author: Jillienne

customer_reviews.title: Too thin.
customer_reviews.text: These taste good, but I was hoping for a thicker balsamic. These are somewhat thin and so don't coat foods as readily as a thicker balsamic would. I don't think I'll be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kyro

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product that I have ever tasted. Totally disappointed. I want my money back for this colored flavored water. There is nothing good about this product. Saying that it is AMAZON's choice is terrible. Tastes like vinegar, nothing like balsamic vinegar with fruits.
customer_reviews.author: Bettyanne G Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift and the recipient loves it! In fact she can’t stop talking about how delicious they are.
customer_reviews.author: Mel K

customer_reviews.title: Enhances any dish!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! The flavors are so rich and adds so much depth to a dish. I have used it in a variety of foods and it never fails to impress me. What a find!
customer_reviews.author: C Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Taste like vinegar and not a balsamic vinegaret. I was hoping for that sweet taste of an aged balsamic vinegaret.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Thin and watery, regret the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. Thin and watery. Not even a good quality balsamic vinegar. Reading the ingredients on the fig condiment: 99% balsamic vinegar and 1% natural fig flavor. Basically a poor quality vinegar with barely a hint of.flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Flavors taste rancid.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using flavored vinegars for years. I thought I would try this brand. I tried 2 of the 4 and they both had a weird bitter taste to the point I had two throw out the dressing and marinade I had made with them. I would like to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: gail wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea... A Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Great as a Gift. Bought it for a relative who cooks and she loved the sampling of vinegar. Surprisingly the fig was a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: genesis

customer_reviews.title: Great tasre and selection
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a balsamic vinegar lover. He was thrilled and is very happy with the different flavors. Some have a better flavor than others but all of them are great
customer_reviews.author: McAdams

customer_reviews.title: Dilution is the solution to bad taste
customer_reviews.text: Flavors are very strong, not very palatable, and product should be used with high dilution or sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Truman

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Love these different flavors! They came beautifully packed and have been fun to use on different dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Nugent

customer_reviews.title: Three out of four tasted like they should have.
customer_reviews.text: Three of the four vinegars were nice. However the pomegranate balsamic smelled and tasted like stink bugs and we had to throw it away which I hated because I love pomegranate and was really looking forward to it. I probably won’t repurchase and will venture to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Blackshire

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok for price but doesn't hold a candle to Alla Vita from Vermont products.
customer_reviews.author: Pajija

customer_reviews.title: Delicious for home or gift
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these for his salads. All flavors are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa M Kulow

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the fig. Very nice variety of vinegars. Good quality. Thick. And you can actually tell the difference between the flavors. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Carmelene

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious! And they taste great. Each one has a distinct flavor.
customer_reviews.author: A. Trotta

customer_reviews.title: These are good but they are really on the potent side
customer_reviews.text: These are good but they are really on the potent side. Not easy to find Organic. A little goes a long way. I wish they made white balsamic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is organic and an import and still arrived in a timely manner
customer_reviews.text: I am excited to have a variety of balsamic. I am discovering many foods that are enhanced by balsamic and it doesn't add calories but does add tang
customer_reviews.author: Bfurst

customer_reviews.title: Good for salads....

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed other brands and this brand is poor unless all ...
customer_reviews.text: Very strong flavor of vinegar, but next to no fruit flavor. I have enjoyed other brands and this brand is poor unless all you desire is a strong vinegar.
customer_reviews.author: John Mallett

customer_reviews.title: Not for giving an added flavor to water
customer_reviews.text: We had found some flavored vinegars in Washington State that added to water gave us a new flavorful way to drink more water. Was hoping these had same effect but they don't. Probably good on salads etc, but not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

product_meta.title: Mantova Organic Flavored Balsamic Vinegar of Modena, Pear, Raspberry, Fig and Pomegranate Vinegar 4-Pack Variety Set, 8.5 fl oz. Per Bottle Great Gift Set
product_meta.description: Size:8.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 4)GREAT MIX OF ORGANIC VINEGARS: Balsamic vinegar has a naturally sweet and tangy flavor that had countless uses in traditional and modern recipes. The succulent flavors of natural, organic pear, fig, raspberry, and pomegranate make these unique condiments a luxurious treat. Fruity and complex, they are great served with raw veg, goat cheese, bread, and beyond. Top your meal with these vinegars to take it to the next level.
feature_bullets: HIGHEST QUALITY: Organic, non-GMO, authentic Italian Balsamic Vinegar of Modena is made with concentrated and cooked organic grape must and organic wine vinegar. Real balsamic is a barrel-aged product. Like wine and cheese, only time, process, and patience can create a quality product.

GREAT TASTE: These Flavored Authentic Balsamic Vinegar of Modena have complex tastes that are at once tart, fruity, and sweet. These unique flavor combinations makes balsamic vinegar of Modena a versatile option for use in both sweet and savory dishes. Unlike other vinegars which have a sharpness, balsamic has a smooth, round flavor that livens up dishes. Add to fish, salad, fresh fruit, chicken, and ice cream.

HEALTHY INGREDIENT: Using flavored balsamic vinegar in balsamic vinaigrette dressing, balsamic glaze, and balsamic reduction is a great way to add high flavor with low calories, plus an added boost of calcium, manganese, and iron. Use in your favorite balsamic vinaigrette recipe or roasted Brussels sprouts with balsamic! Naturally occurring pepsin is a well-known digestive aid.

GOURMET: An everyday ingredient with impeccable taste that turns any meal, appetizer, h’ors d’oeuvres, or dessert from ordinary to extraordinary. This thick balsamic with a sweet and tangy flavor livens up a simple, healthy dinners and truly shines. Makes a great gift for the aspiring chef in your life.

AUTHENTIC ITALIAN: At Mantova, we go beyond “imported.” All of our ingredients are grown and sourced in Italy. We believe Italian quality comes from Italian soil and production methods. All of our products are made from authentic and high-quality Italian ingredients and are pressed and bottled in Italy. It would not be a “real Italian” product without the Italian art of taste selection and blending. That is why Adriano Mantova, with his over 25 years of in-family experience and tradition,
